data.meta_site_name: BHAIRABPUR NETAJI M.E. SCHOOL. ভৈৰৱপুৰ নেতাজী এম. ই. স্কুল
data.text:
INFORMATION

The role of information is vital in making the people known about the infrastructure, physical environment, requirements and necessity, the quality, skill and competency of the teacher of a particular school. The Bhairabpur Netaji M.E. School has its own profile; where all the information and data regarding the infrastructure of the school, condition of school building, classroom, teaching learning materials, sports articles, sanitation, number of teacher, competency educational qualification, professional qualification and other such are been uploaded to make the community pupil known about that. Thus acquainting the community people along with other interested personal know about the school which result in having a clear picture of the particular school.

Name of School:- Bhairabpur Netaji M.E. School.

School Code No:- 18130237102 Category No:- 4 MGI No:-1

Address:- Village:- Bhairabpur, P.O:- Silapathar (787059),

Cluster:- Pachim Muktiar,

Block & Dist :- Dhemaji. Assam

VEC:- 2 No Sila Block, (Code: 02371)

Contract No:- 9957838400

E- mail :- gcd_slp@rediffmail.com

OUR ACHIEVEMENTS

 Best School Award 2010-2011, Cluster Level, issued by Assam Mahila Samata Society, Dhemaji.

 First Prize, Science/ Maths Project & Model Competition 2011, Block Level, organized by SSA, Dhemaji District.

 Best Teacher Award 2012, To Gopal Chandra Deb (HM), District Level, issued by District Administrative, Dhemaji District.

 Best School Award 2012-2013, District Level, issued by District Mission Co-ordinator, Sarva Siksha Abhiyan, Dhemaji District

 Best Mother Group Award 15-08-2015, District Level, issued by District Administrative, Dhemaji District.

 Second Prize, Procession Competition 2017, organized by Silapathar Science College & Aryabhatta Science, Centre Sissi Block on occasion of National Science Day, 2017

 Acquire Chief Minister’s Special Scholarship in every year by the students..

 Best Teacher Award 2018, To Gopal Chandra Deb (HM), State Level, issued by Govt. of Assam
